word: The second door . . . is reached. It opens . . . with no creaking of hinges or rattling of iron bolts. . . . In the same way they pass through the third gateway, and find themselves in the open street. . . . The angel glides on in front, encircled by a light of dazzling brightness. . . . Thus they pass on through one street, and then, the mission of the angel being accomplished, he suddenly disappears.
